message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice,  $14,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $12,000.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product for you. What do you say?
